Taste of food is good in s cafe but not hygienic Like chowmien ma thkai thiyo but kaile achar ma smell aaucha ta kaile noodle ma otherwise all good but their is no hygiene in their cafe tyo maintain garnu paryo

I recently visited Sanepa Delight and was thoroughly impressed by their food and services. The star of the evening was undoubtedly the Chicken C Momo. The dumplings were perfectly cooked, with a soft, tender wrapper and a filling that was flavorful and juicy. The blend of spices in the chicken was just right, making each bite a delightful experience

aauta naya thaau dekhera khana gako the, ambience chai babbal lagyo. aani tespaxi chiya, churot magaye. churot ta yekkai xin mai layediyio, tara chita ta jhandai 1 hrs layo haau layedina ni. tei mathi fateko dudh ko chiya jastai thiyi. xyaa muji bekkar chiya khaye jastai lagya thiyo. tyo din dekhi tya gako xaina chiya khana lai. Tara waiter chai last sexyy thiyo haai tyo resturant ko. staff matra sexyy rakhera hunna raixa, khane kura ni mitho banauna paryo.
seat ma basi sake paxi pani, order lina ko lagi kunai response nai aayena. Afai gayera order diyera aaye. Ali table haru messy thiyo
Momo mitho thiyo, ramro tarika ma masala lagayeko thiyo ra juicy pani thiyo. Mahol sajilo thiyo ra swagat gariraheko thiyo. Nishchit rupma punah audai chhu!
Dal bhat ko swad kami thiyo ra mulya ko lagi ali kam bhat thiyo. Overall anubhav le man parena.
Thakali set asli thiyo ra swadisht thiyo. Serve gareko vividh bhoj haru manparo. Uchit samjhiyeko!
Seva dhilo thiyo ra khana naramro thiyo. Intajar garna ya mulya ko lagi yogyana thiyo.
Momo chutney mero ruchi ko lagi dherai tato thiyo tara mukhya bhoj swadisht thiyo. Tato khana manparne haruko lagi subhawana garchhu.
Mahol jivantriko thiyo ra karmachari sajilo thiyo. Bhogera live sangeet pradarshan bhogera maza lina sakne. Yaadgar anubhav!
Aloo tama dherai khatta thiyo ra bhat adhik pakaye. Swad ya gunasampannata ko man parena.
Momo sada thiyo, khasai atiuttama thiyo bhawishya ma aayeko prashansa raheko yastai antarwasita ko drishtanta.
Sel roti crispy ra swadisht thiyo. Ghar ma pakka bhojan yaad dilayo. Nishchit rupma punah aaunchhu!
Seva uttam thiyo, tara khana asliyat ma kami thiyo. Euta Nepali restaurant bata yo prashansa garda sadhai ashanka thiyo.
